Norwegian: redd, but also bange (archaic, mostly used in standard expressions like "bange anelser")
gutt, dreng (archaic or used in a more narrow sense)
sludder, vrøvl, nonsens, tull, tøys, vås
sau, smale (archaic/dialectal), får (archaic/dialectal, used in expressions/ fixed phrases )

Danish: somme tider, iblandt, (colloquial:) nogle gange, af og til, indimellem,

Norwegian: [meite]makk, [mete]mark, orm (Ambiguous, could mean both worm and snake, cf. wyrm.)
